locator.name: 线下充值单选框
locator.value: #content > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td.form-inline.fund_audit > div.offline > label:nth-child(2)

locator.name: 银行账号输入框
locator.value: #content > form > table > tbody > tr.offline > td:nth-child(2) > input[type='text']

locator.name: 金额输入框
locator.value: #content > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(4) > td:nth-child(2) > div > input

locator.name: 验证码按钮
locator.value: #content > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(5) > td:nth-child(2) > input

locator.name: 确认提交
